Smelt ores/items.

**Usage**

- `/smelt name:<string> [quantity:<integer>] [blast_furnace:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The name of the thing you want to smelt. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity you want to smelt. | - |
| `blast_furnace` | `boolean` | No | If you want to blast furnace the bars. | - |

**Examples**

- `/smelt runite bar`
- `/smelt runite bar [quantity: 1]`
